definition: Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

sentences.english: Alum has a lot of uses. This is only one of them.
sentences.chinese: 明礬有許多用法，這只是其中一種。

sentences.english: Purchase alum from any grocery store or pharmacy.
sentences.chinese: 首先從食品雜貨店或者藥店買一些明礬。

sentences.english: But chemical mordents mordants such as allon alum are popular today.
sentences.chinese: 但是化學腐蝕劑例如明礬現在很流行。

sentences.english: The tests of extraction aluminium from alum stone with alkali fusion method were carried out.
sentences.chinese: 對用鹼熔法從明礬石中提取鋁進行了實驗。

sentences.english: "Green vitriol and aluminous property of a medicine " .
The simple steps in how to use alum to fireproof is listed below.
sentences.chinese: 下面的步驟就是講解如何用明礬來製作防火衣。

sentences.english: Some use a pound of alum to a full pail of water.
sentences.chinese: 也有人把一磅明礬加到了一滿桶裏邊。

sentences.english: You can clarify the water by adding a little alum.
sentences.chinese: 你在水裏加一點明礬就能使水淨化。

sentences.english: Wood ash , is one 1 example. But chemical mordents mordants such as Elam alum are popular today.
sentences.chinese: 但是現在化學金屬腐蝕劑比如明礬也很流行。

sentences.english: The current rectification is like a dose of alum.
sentences.chinese: 這次整風，就是放一把明礬。

sentences.english: But chemical mordants such as alum are popular today.
sentences.chinese: 但如今明礬一類的化學媒染劑更受歡迎。

definition: clear soup/white broth, also called 奶湯|奶汤[nai3 tang1]/decoction of chrysanthemum, liquorice and certain other herbs
raw materials for making soup/packaged soup mix
black-boned chicken/silky fowl/silkie/Gallus gallus domesticus Brisson
to dry over a fire/to roast
liquorice (Sophora flavescens), with roots used in TCM
